reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here two nights but ate out both nights so only had breakfast in the hotel. Our room on the first floor overlooked the sea (through the trees) and had a double and a single bed although we had only booked a double. The ensuite was fairly small and you didn't need to be too fat to get through the curved sliding shower doors. It had obviously been updated of late and was smart. You were served breakfast but it came quite quickly with a fair range of food for 2 star. The staff in particular were most friendly and most helpful. There is some hotel parking at the back with access through the ballroom. This is a two star hotel - don't expect 3/4 star decor/appointments. The fact that Exmouth Rotary & Round Table both meet here must say a lot about its local reputation.
reviews.title: Good value for money seaside hotel - super staff!

reviews.text: I stayed with two family members in May 2013. The building is very old so a bit quirky (for me that adds character) but well maintained and clean and tidy everywhere. The staff are unfailingly helpful and friendly. The food is good with a varied choice on the menu and good sized servings. The room price included a three course breakfast and four course dinner - amazing! It is in a great location - near the sea (approx. 5 mins walk), opposite a lovely little park and right next to the town centre (approx. 2 mins walk).
reviews.title: Friendly and excellent value for money

reviews.text: We went to Exmouth for a friends party so didn't spend a great deal of time at the hotel. However it was clean and comfortable . Staff were friendly and we had a great view of the sea from our room.
reviews.title: Good for a flying visit.

reviews.text: The breakfast was a bit of a let down . I had the English breakfast and the bread was soggy and not really cooked.
reviews.title: Second visit

reviews.text: Generally a good stop off place but I would have been disapointed if I had been staying longer.
reviews.title: I Can Recommend This Hotel.
